4 GRID

Fluid, mobile-first grid framework based on Griddle by @necolas

4.1 Grid

Wrapper element required for each "row" of grid items. Avoids requirement to have .first or .last classes. Apply modifier classes here to control various properties of nested grid units.

I am a grid unit within a {$modifiers} modifier
I am a grid unit within a {$modifiers} modifier
.grid--double-gutter

doubles the default gutter size

I am a grid unit within a grid--double-gutter modifier
I am a grid unit within a grid--double-gutter modifier
.grid--half-gutter

halves the default gutter size

I am a grid unit within a grid--half-gutter modifier
I am a grid unit within a grid--half-gutter modifier
.grid--no-gutter

removes all gutters

I am a grid unit within a grid--no-gutter modifier
I am a grid unit within a grid--no-gutter modifier
.grid--ib

throws grid into inline-block mode. Useful for fixing nasty clearing problems

I am a grid unit within a grid--ib modifier
I am a grid unit within a grid--ib modifier
.grid--divided

applies bottom vertical spacing to each grid unit

I am a grid unit within a grid--divided modifier
I am a grid unit within a grid--divided modifier
<div class="grid {$modifiers}">
 <div class="gc d1-2">I am a grid unit within a {$modifiers} modifier</div>
 <div class="gc d1-2">I am a grid unit within a {$modifiers} modifier</div>
</div>

4.2 Grid Column/Unit

Base grid unit. Defaults to "stacked", "mobile first" styles.

I am a grid unit
So am I!
And me...
<div class="grid">
 <div class="gc">I am a grid unit</div>
 <div class="gc">So am I!</div>
 <div class="gc">And me...</div>
</div>

4.3 Horiztonal Alignment

Modifiers to control the horizontal alignment of the grid.

4.3.1 Centered

Aligns the grid centrally.

I am a grid unit
So am I!
And me...
<div class="grid grid--center">
 <div class="gc">I am a grid unit</div>
 <div class="gc">So am I!</div>
 <div class="gc">And me...</div>
</div>

4.3.2 Left

Aligns the grid to the left.

I am a grid unit
So am I!
And me...
<div class="grid grid--left">
 <div class="gc">I am a grid unit</div>
 <div class="gc">So am I!</div>
 <div class="gc">And me...</div>
</div>

4.3.3 Right

Aligns the grid to the right.

I am a grid unit
So am I!
And me...
<div class="grid grid--right">
 <div class="gc">I am a grid unit</div>
 <div class="gc">So am I!</div>
 <div class="gc">And me...</div>
</div>

4.4 Vertical Alignment

Modifiers to control the vertical alignment of the grid.

4.4.1 Middle

Aligns the grid to the vertical center

I am a grid unit
So am I!
And me...
<div class="grid grid--vmiddle">
 <div class="gc">I am a grid unit</div>
 <div class="gc">So am I!</div>
 <div class="gc">And me...</div>
</div>

4.4.2 Bottom

Aligns the grid to the vertical bottom.

I am a grid unit
So am I!
And me...
<div class="grid grid--vbottom">
 <div class="gc">I am a grid unit</div>
 <div class="gc">So am I!</div>
 <div class="gc">And me...</div>
</div>
